headline: Why IDEAYA Biosciences (IDYA) Is Down 5.2% After Completing Enrollment In Pivotal Uveal Melanoma Trial
summary: IDEAYA Biosciences recently completed full enrollment of 435 patients in its registration-enabling Phase 2/3 OptimUM-02 trial testing oral PKC inhibitor darovasertib plus Pfizer’s crizotinib in first-line HLA*A2-negative metastatic uveal melanoma, while also advancing IDE034 and IDE574 into early-stage clinical development. This milestone underscores IDEAYA’s push to convert promising early uveal melanoma data and multiple FDA designations for darovasertib into a potential accelerated...
